name: Crystalline Devil
damage_resistances: acid, cold; bludgeoning, piercing, and slashing from nonmagical attacks not made with silvered weapons

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The devil makes three Claw attacks.

actions.name: Shard Claw (Fiend Form Only)
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 13 (2d8 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Crystalline Spray (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The crystalline devil sprays a burst of crystal shards. Each creature within 15 feet of the devil must make a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw, taking 27 (6d8) piercing damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful one.

special_abilities.name: Devil's Sight
special_abilities.desc: Magical darkness doesn't impede the crystalline devil's darkvision.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance (Gemstone Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: While the devil remains motionless, it is indistinguishable from an ordinary gemstone.

special_abilities.name: Glittering Temptation (Gemstone Form Only)
special_abilities.desc: The devil sheds dim light in a 5-foot radius. Each creature that starts its turn within 30 feet of the devil and that can see it must succeed on a DC 15 Wisdom saving throw or be charmed for 1 minute. While charmed, a creature is incapacitated and must move on its turn toward the devil by the safest route, trying to get within 5 feet of the devil to hold it. The charmed creature can repeat the saving throw at the end of each of its turns, ending the effect on itself on a success. On a success, a creature is also immune to this devil's Glittering Temptation for the next 24 hours. A creature charmed by the devil has disadvantage on the saving throw against Crystalline Spray.

special_abilities.name: Magic Resistance
special_abilities.desc: The crystalline devil has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.
